statements: SELECT * FROM Credit_Risk;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM Credit_Risk WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT payment_history FROM Credit_Risk WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, payment_history FROM Credit_Risk ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM Credit_Risk WHERE credit_score < 600 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Credit_Risk WHERE credit_score > 700
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM Credit_Risk WHERE payment_history LIKE '%late%' ORDER BY credit_score DESC
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, payment_history FROM Credit_Risk WHERE credit_score < 600 AND payment_history NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Credit_Risk WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 650 AND 750 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Credit_Risk WHERE payment_history IS NULL
SELECT * FROM credit_scores;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM payment_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT credit_scores.customer_id, credit_score, payment_date, amount FROM credit_scores INNER JOIN payment_history ON credit_scores.customer_id = payment_history.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(credit_score) AS max_credit_score FROM credit_scores GROUP BY customer_id HAVING MAX(credit_score) > 650;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM payment_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_payments DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT cs.customer_id, cs.credit_score, ph.payment_date, ph.amount FROM credit_scores cs JOIN payment_history ph ON cs.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE ph.amount > 1000;
SELECT cs.customer_id, cs.credit_score, ph.payment_date FROM credit_scores cs LEFT JOIN payment_history ph ON cs.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE ph.amount IS NULL;
SELECT id, customer_id, credit_score FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, amount FROM PaymentHistory WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM CreditScores ORDER BY credit_score ASC
SELECT id, customer_id, risk_score FROM CreditRiskAnalysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, amount FROM PaymentHistory WHERE amount >= 500
SELECT * FROM CreditScores ORDER BY credit_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CreditScores WHERE customer_id = 12345
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, amount FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, risk_score FROM CreditRiskAnalysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT CreditScores.customer_id, CreditRiskAnalysis.risk_score FROM CreditScores JOIN CreditRiskAnalysis ON CreditScores.customer_id = CreditRiskAnalysis.customer_id
SELECT * FROM credit_score;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_score WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, maximum_limit FROM credit_limit WHERE current_balance > 500;
SELECT customer_id, risk_level FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_score WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_history FROM payment_history WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, maximum_limit, current_balance FROM credit_limit WHERE maximum_limit > 100000 ORDER BY current_balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, risk_level FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM credit_score cs JOIN credit_limit cl ON cs.customer_id = cl.customer_id WHERE cs.credit_score > 700 ORDER BY cs.credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditScores
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CreditScores
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE risk_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CreditHistory
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CreditHistory WHERE credit_limit < 10000 ORDER BY credit_limit ASC
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE factor_description LIKE '%credit%' ORDER BY risk_id
SELECT customer_id, risk_score FROM RiskAnalysis WHERE analysis_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY customer_id
